src:
Kapolsek Wajo Makassar Kecelakaan, Bodi Mobil Ringsek Tabrak Truk
04 Nov 2019, 22:48 by Hermawan Mappiwali
Makassar -
Kapolsek Wajo, Makassar, Sulsel, mengalami kecelakaan saat berkendara di Jalan Tol Reformasi. Bodi depan mobil ringsek menabrak truk, Kapolsek selamat.
"Iya saya tabrak mobil (truk) parkir. Saya tabrak di pendakian itu. Tapi saya baik-baik ji (selamat)," ujar Kompol Yon Max saat dihubungi detikcom, Senin (4/11/2019).
Kompol Yon Max menceritakan mobilnya menabrak truk di Jalan Tol Reformasi, yang berdekatan dengan RS Angkatan Laut Jala Ammari, Makassar, sekitar pukul 21.00 Wita. Akibatnya, mobil Toyota Kijang miliknya ringsek di bagian depan.
Kompol Yon Max tak bisa menghindar karena tidak ada tanda-tanda truk sedang diparkir.
"Saya sendiri yang setir (mobil saya) mau pulang dari kantor. Saya tidak lihat, ih kenapa ada truk parkir di pendakian, di jalur satu," ujarnya.
"Nggak ada tanda-tanda, kalau ada tanda-tanda tidak mungkin dong (saya tabrak). Ndak ada lampu menyala, tiba-tiba. Kaget saya, langsung banting (setir), kalau saya tidak banting, habis saya," imbuhnya.

(fdn/fdn)
text:
Wajo Makassar Police Chief Accident, Ringek Car Body Hit Truck
Nov 04 2019, 22:48 by Hermawan Mappiwali
Makassar -
The Wajo police chief, Makassar, South Sulawesi, had an accident while driving on the Reformasi Toll Road. The front body of a wrecked car crashed into a truck, the police chief survived.
"Yes I hit a car (truck) parked. I crashed in the climb. But I'm fine ji (congratulations)," Kompol Yon Max said when contacted by AFP on Monday (4/11/2019).
Kompol Yon Max described his car crashing into a truck on the Reformasi Toll Road, which is adjacent to the Jala Ammari Naval Hospital, Makassar, at around 21.00 Wita. As a result, his Toyota Kijang wrecked at the front.
Comrade Yon Max could not avoid because there was no sign of the truck being parked.
"I myself want to drive (my car) to go home from the office. I don't see, why is there a truck parked on the climb, on line one," he said.
"There are no signs, if there are signs it is not possible (I crashed). There are no lights on, suddenly. I was shocked, immediately swerved (steering), if I did not slam, I was finished," he added.

(fdn / fdn)
